item.description:
Hello Providence Newcomers!
This Sunday we'll be meeting at Roger Williams Park for a picnic. Please bring any outdoor games and sporting equipment with you. I can contribute a soccer ball and a frisbee. Bring your own lunch and any extra snacks that you want to share with others.

For more info on the Park, visit http://www.rogerwilli...

We'll meet at the tables down at the south end of the park (just off Park Ave). If you have trouble finding us you can call me on my cell phone at (609) 577-1576.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Picnic at Roger Williams Park
